title: Apple Announces Apple Silicon Chips for Mac
description: When it comes to the Mac line of Apple devices, there was more than just a software reveal. Apple announced that it is migrating from Intel processors to its own Apple silicon chips in the future.

title: The Current Pandemic
description: This article informs readers about the dangerous rapid-spreading novel coronavirus. The disease is known to impact many people. The article provides readers with information about the spread of the disease and relations to other disease.

title: Delayed Sleep Syndrome
description: This article informs readers about the widespread sleep disorder known as Delayed Sleep Phase Syndrome (DSPS). This sleep disorder affects numerous high school students and adults. There are many ways to natural ways to cope with DSPS.

title: Vietnam is Still Suffering from Agent Orange Pollutants
description: This article informs readers about the catastrophic dioxin that was introduced to Vietnam during the Civil War. Agent Orange is one of the deadliest herbicides used in Vietnam. The United States used Agent Orange during the Vietnam War unaware of the consequences that it would bestow on the country. The article provides information about the dioxin itself.

title: Covid-19: Spread, Transmission, and Prevention (Updated)
description: This article informs readers about the updated information regarding the novel coronavirus. The Covid-19 pandemic has affected millions of people, but this article provides readers with information on how to avoid catching and spreading the virus.
